ValidationRule.description: Makes sure that the user changes Tags the Case before Closing
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( GDPR_Wiped__c = false, OR( ISCHANGED(IsClosed), ISPICKVAL(Status, "Closed") ), OR( AND(AND(ISPICKVAL(FCS_Case_Reason__c, ""), ISPICKVAL(FCS_CaseType__c, "")), AND(ISPICKVAL(FCS_CaseReason__c,""),ISPICKVAL(Type,""))) ) )
